caption.courtNameFormat: IN THE {ORDINAL} JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT OF THE STATE OF NEVADA IN AND FOR THE COUNTY OF {COUNTY}

specialRules.preemptionNote: Local district court rules preempt state rules where they conflict — check individual judicial district rules

implementationNotes: Nevada local judicial district rules PREEMPT state rules where they conflict — always check local rules first
Clark County (Las Vegas) Eighth Judicial District has extensive local rules (EDCR)
Washoe County (Reno) Second Judicial District has its own local rules as well
